definition: n. merchandise issued for sale or public showing (especially a record or film)
n. a process that liberates or discharges something
n. a device that when pressed will release part of a mechanism
n. activity that frees or expresses creative energy or emotion

example_sentences.cn: 陶德的一切都那么深藏于内心，这[血]就像是他的感情释放。
example_sentences.en: Everything is so internal with Sweeney that [the blood] is like his emotional release.

example_sentences.cn: 配置文件类和列举在这个释放中是不被支持的；因此，它们不会显示在这个向导中。
example_sentences.en: Profile class and enumerations are not supported in this release; therefore, they do not show up in the wizard.

example_sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，您可以捕获来自流的资源，将您制订的该资源的版本发布到流中，或者也可以把您的工作与流资源合并起来。
example_sentences.en: In this situation, you can either catch up the resource from the stream, release your version of the resource to the stream, or merge your work and the stream resource.

example_sentences.cn: 他们选择采用开源许可协议去发布一些代码和进行一定的日常工作。
example_sentences.en: They have chosen to release some of that code and work product under an open source license.

example_sentences.cn: 我在平衡状态，释放物体。
example_sentences.en: So I release it at the equilibrium.

example_sentences.cn: 在这个范围的一端是在它的项目计划的基础上，发布一个应用软件的能力。
example_sentences.en: At one end of the spectrum is the ability to release an application based on its project plan.

example_sentences.cn: 并发性和吞吐量还与您释放锁的时间有关。
example_sentences.en: Concurrency and throughput also have to do with when you release the locks.

example_sentences.cn: 在这个范围的另一端是一个由部门或者组织控制的协调发布周期。
example_sentences.en: At the other end of the spectrum is a coordinated release cycle by a department or organization.

example_sentences.cn: 您要明白您将制作什么样的官方的构件作为这是发布的一部分。
example_sentences.en: You need to understand what official builds you will be making as part of the official release.

example_sentences.cn: 你知道你们的应用程序的发布流程吗？
example_sentences.en: Do you know the release process for your app?

example_sentences.cn: 那么在所有已构建的和有用的行业验收定义之后，什么是软件发布记录呢？
example_sentences.en: So after all the build up and useful industry accepted definitions, what is the Software Release Record?

example_sentences.cn: 线上方的故事会包含在发布中，下面的就不在。
example_sentences.en: Stories above the line are in the release, and those below are not.

example_sentences.cn: 众人聚集的时候，彼拉多就对他们说，你们要我释放那一个给你们。
example_sentences.en: Therefore when they were gathered together, Pilate said unto them, Whom will ye that I release unto you?

example_sentences.cn: 当在团队中讨论之后，举例来说，您知道是否应该推迟发布或照常继续。
example_sentences.en: After discussing within the team, you know whether you should for example delay the release or continue as normal.

example_sentences.cn: 这种共同评审应该以有组织的方式至少在每次发布后进行一次，最好在每次迭代之后进行。
example_sentences.en: This kind of collective review should happen in an organized way at least after every release, preferably after every iteration.

example_sentences.cn: 但我认为对外界而言，最显著的、最能看到的变化是我们的发布周期。
example_sentences.en: But I think the most prominent and visible change to the outside world is our release cycle.

example_sentences.cn: 当你点击每个浏览器的图标，你可以看到浏览器窗口在每一步释放中是如何改变，我认为这是交互式中的最有趣的部分。
example_sentences.en: As you click each browser icon, you can see how the browser window has changed for each release, which I think is the most interesting part of the interactive.

example_sentences.cn: 但是什么是“海怪”和为什么任何人都要释放它？
example_sentences.en: But what is a Kraken, and why would anyone want to release it?

example_sentences.cn: 那时我们才会释放这里的人。
example_sentences.en: Then will we release these people.

example_sentences.cn: 因为这是一个现存的新路径，您可以确保见到更令人振奋的新方法和添加到每个释放中的性能。
example_sentences.en: Because this is an exciting new path, you can be sure to see more exciting innovations and capabilities added in each release.

example_sentences.cn: 但是最重要的部分是下一次迭代或者下一次发布所要采取的活动。
example_sentences.en: But the most important part is the actions to be taken at next iteration or next release.

example_sentences.cn: 那么对于现在附着与所有产品，语言或是发布的“面向服务”的鼓动与口哨，我们拿它们怎么办呢？
example_sentences.en: So what are we to make of all the “service-oriented” bells and whistles currently being hung on every product, language, or release?

example_sentences.cn: 在今天或者未来的某一天开始发布和第一次迭代。
example_sentences.en: Start the release and first iteration today or some day in the near future.

example_sentences.cn: RNA计算机一旦进入某一细胞内部，如果发现病毒或癌症的踪迹，它就可以释放相应药物来仅仅杀死这一个细胞。
example_sentences.en: Once inside the cell, if the RNA computer finds tracers of a virus or cancer it could release the appropriate drugs to kill just that one cell.

example_sentences.cn: 所带来的疼痛和冲击应该会使它松开你。
example_sentences.en: The pain and shock should make it release you.

example_sentences.cn: 从现在开始过一种简单的生活吧——那么你将释放出很多的时间和精力。
example_sentences.en: Start living a simpler life from today — and you will release a lot of time and energy.

example_sentences.cn: 此外，频繁的迭代也许是个好主意，因为您知道自己可以在数周而不是数月内实现和发布更改。
example_sentences.en: Still, frequent iterations might be a good idea, because you know that you can implement and release changes in weeks rather than months.

example_sentences.cn: 但是我们并没打算因为处理那些看上去很好的特性，而影响发布日期。
example_sentences.en: But we do not intend for the nice-to-do features to affect the release date.

example_sentences.cn: 但是我们并没打算因为处理那些看上去很好的特性，而影响发布日期。
example_sentences.en: But we do not intend for the nice-to-do features to affect the release date.

word_group.cn: n. 通讯社或政府机构发布的新闻稿（等于press release）
发布日期；发行日期；出厂日期
释放机构；安全机构；分离机构；脱开机械装置
脱产进修（英国和欧洲大陆提高企业人员水平的）

translation: n. 释放, 发泄, 豁免, 发行, 释放证书
vt. 释放, 解除, 放松, 豁免, 免除, 发布, 放弃, 让与
